message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe this product would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $1500000. We understand that the value of this product may vary depending on your specific requirements, but we are confident that this price reflects its true worth and potential impact on your business or lifestyle. We look forward to discussing how this product can be a valuable asset to you. Please let us know if you have any questions or require further information.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe it's a great product, but I'm not sure if it's worth the full $1500000 to me. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to be comfortable with the price.
